text: Ahmet Özcan (born 7 March 1995) is a Swiss footballer who plays as a centre- back. == Club career == Özcan made his professional debut for Lausanne in a Swiss Super League 4–0 loss to FC Zürich on 7 December 2013. He transferred over to Kayserispor on 2014, wherein he only made appearances with the youth team and then briefly transferred to Gençlerbirliği. ==International career== Özcan was born in Switzerland and is of Turkish descent. He is a youth international for Switzerland at the U19 level. ==References== ==External links== * * Ozcan SFL Profile * Ozcan Eurosport Profile * * Ahmet Özcan at Footballdatabase * Ahmet Özcan at Voetbal Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:People from Lausanne Category:Swiss people of Turkish descent Category:Swiss footballers Category:Switzerland youth international footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Swiss Super League players Category:FC Lausanne-Sport players Category:FC Sion players Category:TFF First League players Category:Kayserispor footballers Category:Gençlerbirliği S.K. footballers Category:TFF Second League players Category:Hacettepe S.K. footballers Category:Segunda División B players Category:Real Balompédica Linense footballers Category:FC Köniz players Category:Liga II players Category:FC Dunărea Călărași players Category:Swiss expatriate footballers Category:Swiss expatriate sportspeople in Spain Category:Expatriate footballers in Spain Category:Swiss expatriate sportspeople in Romania Category:Expatriate footballers in Romania
title: Ahmet Özcan
